00053 template <class _Traits> mfTriCell<_Traits>::mfTriCell()
00054 {
00055 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00056         pthread_mutex_lock(&this->smutex);
00057 #endif
00058

00061                 edges[i] = -1;

00077 template <class _Traits> IDS mfTriCell<_Traits>::getEdgeId(int index MF_DMUTEXV)
00078 {
00079         MF_ASSERT((index >= 0)&&(index < 3));
00080 
00081         MF_LOCK(smutex);
00082 
00083         ids temp = edges[index];
00084 
00085         MF_UNLOCK(smutex);
00086 
00087         return temp;
00088 }

00090 template <class _Traits> void mfTriCell<_Traits>::setEdgeId(int index, ids edge MF_DMUTEXV)
00091 {
00092         MF_ASSERT((index >= 0)&&(index < 3));
00093 
00094         MF_LOCK(smutex);
00095 
00096         edges[index] = edge;
